title: NA> ALL
body: iem katowice says it all korea challenger is now na bronze {{champion:57}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:236}}  new tsm skins

replies.body:
While NA definitely earned a lot of respect for the NA region at IEM, I still think china is the best region and i'm still confused as to why omg or edg didn't represent china instead of we

(plus, do we REALLY need another annie skin?)

Because OMG or EDG didn't win an IEM event.
WE won IEM Shenzhen

iG, OMG, EDG and WE were all in IEM Shenzhen.
WE beat EDG in the finals to get their spot for IEM Katowice.

Also, you do not get a team does not get a skin for them for winning IEM World Championship. Only for winning RIOT WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP.

Sorry, no tsm skin for you (targeted at the OP)!
